itunes:title: finding a lifestyle that will last a lifetime & fitness this-or-that with Alex Rice
title: finding a lifestyle that will last a lifetime & fitness this-or-that with Alex Rice
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
This week, we're welcoming Alex Rice to the podcast for some fun & gains. Everyone's favorite garage gym go-er is here talk about getting comfortable in the gym, snacks, consistency, realistic routines, fav books & more. Plus, Britt & Alex cap things off with a game of fitness this-or-that!
